Text: Thanks for the opportunity, but I think I'll wait for the true release. I read that the final product will ship January 15th. Which is in three days. So the true release should be available any time now =)

Actually this is ok. I just don't like it when everytime I quit word an alert window pops up as if it crash/quit.

As for waiting for the final release on the 15th, I'm not holding my breath, remember we're talking about MicroSoft. Most likely it will be 2010 before the 2008 comes out. They really don't care about Mac users and only do what they have to, to get the growing number of Mac switchers to play nice with Windows.

to the user above me (hockpooh?): Office 2008 is available for pre-order since about a week now. i would worry more about product update etc. if you have installed any recent Adobe product you would know what kind of nightmare it is.
